thread.title: Tanke, Inc. Announces Reduction of Shares Outstanding in Advance of $0.01 Buyback

author: cnbc.com
title: Tanke, Inc. Announces Reduction of Shares Outstanding in Advance of $0.01 Buyback
text:
LAS VEGAS, April 13, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Tanke, Inc. (OTC PINK: TNKE) is a developmental stage diversified holding company, with the mission to develop, manage, and finance emerging companies in high growth industries. Tanke is focused on the development of environmental technologies.
Tanke, Inc. (OTC PINK: TNKE) (the "Company") Today announced that the Company will retire approximately 200,000,000 shares of common stock back into the corporate treasury which will reduce the total shares outstanding to approximately 464,833,402 shares as the first step in this process.
Regarding OTC Markets and Nevada Secretary of State, company legal team has filed its annual reports and letter of attorney, with OTC Markets. Legal team is also renewing our status with Nevada Secretary of State.
The Company will keep the investment community and its shareholders informed of the entire process as the details continue to develop.
About Tanke, Inc.
Tanke, Inc. is a developmental stage diversified holding company, with the mission to develop, manage and finance emerging companies in high growth industries. Tanke is focused on the development of environmental technologies.
Forward-Looking Statements
